Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem provides data that are not associated with any of the Copernicus Services or are generated by third parties. These datasets include Sentinel-1 related products such as RTC (Radiometrically Terrain Corrected), CARD-BS (Terrain-Corrected Backscatter), Orbits; Sentinel-2 based global mosaics; land cover for Europe and Poland (S2GLC) and Digital Elevation Models (COP DEM  and SRTM DEM).
